document_type: Final Determination Notification and Payroll Authorization Forms
security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document includes a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding the status of HSCA staff payroll records, specifically Social Security numbers which are postponed due to privacy concerns, along with payroll authorization forms for Surell Brady, a Staff Counsel for the HSCA.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) and includes a Final Determination Notification detailing the reasons for postponing the release of Social Security numbers within HSCA staff payroll records to protect personal privacy. It also contains payroll authorization forms and related memoranda documenting the employment and salary of Surell Brady as Staff Counsel for the John F. Kennedy Task Force, including her appointment, salary adjustments, and certifications regarding relationships with members of Congress.
title: Final Determination Notification Regarding HSCA Staff Payroll Records
recipient: Thomas Howarth, Elizabeth Berning, ALL STAFF
sender: I. Charles Mathews, Assassination Records Review Board
